data.title: Hotels in Rapperswil
data.meta_description: Discover Rapperswil-Jona's largest selection of hotels and simplify your search with cozycozy. Compare all options and book your perfect stay today!
data.text:
8.9Very good 852 reviews

Rapperswil-Jona

2 1

$461/nighttotal: $3227 (7 )

Marina Lachen

hotel - Lachen

The Marina Lachen hotel is located on the shores of Lake Zurich, a short walk from Lachen Train Station and a 40-minute drive from Zurich city center. This 4-star hotel is highly rated by guests for its cleanliness, location, and overall experience.

The hotel offers comfortable rooms with queen-size beds, TVs, sofas, and workspaces. Guests can enjoy a variety of amenities, including a restaurant, a bar, a garden, a terrace, and free Wi-Fi throughout the property.

8.1Very good 1405 reviews

Rapperswil-Jona

2 1

$378/nighttotal: $2646 (7 )

Rössli Hurden

hotel - Freienbach

The Rössli Hurden hotel is located on the shores of Lake Zurich, between Pfäffikon and Rapperswil, close to Freienbach, offering stunning lake views and a tranquil atmosphere. This 3-star hotel has received very good user ratings for its cleanliness and overall experience.

The Rössli Hurden features a spacious lakeside restaurant and a pier for small private boats. The hotel also offers free parking, a garden, a terrace, a concierge, and free Wi-Fi throughout the property.

8.5Very good 1199 reviews

Rapperswil-Jona

2 1

$218/nighttotal: $1526 (7 )

Moxy Rapperswil

hotel - Rapperswil-Jona

The Moxy Rapperswil is located in Rapperswil-Jona, a charming town just 10 miles from the historic Einsiedeln Abbey. The hotel has earned excellent ratings for cleanliness and a very good rating for both location and overall experience.

The Moxy Rapperswil offers a variety of amenities, including a fitness center, free Wi-Fi, a shared lounge, and a snack bar. Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast and a bar, as well as a business center for those who need to work.

Rapperswil-Jona

2 1

$254/nighttotal: $1778 (7 )

Dorf Hotel *Cosy Suite*

hotel - Lachen

This stylish apartment is located in a charming district of Lachen, just a short walk from the lakefront and the town's main attractions. It offers a peaceful and tranquil setting, perfect for a relaxing getaway.

The apartment features one bedroom and one bathroom, comfortably accommodating two guests. It is equipped with a modern kitchen, a comfortable living area, and other amenities to ensure a pleasant stay.
